file.name: URIError.yaml
file.content:
%YAML 1.2
---
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: Hey Mum! I'm on GitHub!
  description: Resource definition.
  version: 1.0.0

servers:
  - url: https://boom.com

paths:
  "/test":
    get:
      summary: Dummy endpoint.
      description: Cf. summary
      responses:
        "200":
          description: All is good.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        "400":
          description: Bad Request.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
        "500":
          description: No Bueno.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "./lib.yaml#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  schemas:
    Error:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Baz"
    Baz:
      $ref: ./lib.yaml#/components/schemas/Error
    Foo:
      type: string
